ygData.subject: WTYH and mesmerization
ygData.msgSnippet: While they didn t change WTYH I have started using it again. To my suprise it is VERY efficient at my level (just hit 27).  I can keep a blue mob stunned for
ygData.messageBody:
While they didn't change WTYH I have started using it again. To my
suprise it is VERY efficient at my level (just hit 27). I can keep a
blue mob stunned for the duration of the fight by chain casting WTYH.
Only useful if you are in a group, perhaps, but the result is quite
astounding. Instead of burning 75 or 100 mana for DD of 95 to 149
damage, I can whirl twice so my tanks pound the snot out of it for more
damamge than I could have done with my attack spell.

Mesmerization now mesmerizes the caster if you are in the AOE. LAME!
Keep this one in your useless file for now.

Q
